Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the MCF-7 cell line transfected with wild-type p53 or the variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_000546.4:c.826G>A in MCF-7 cells compared to wild-type p53.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type p53 protein was used as a positive control.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: A benign variant was also tested for comparison.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Tukey's multiple comparison test was used to compare the mean protein expression levels among the groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression level greater than 80% of wild-type p53 in MCF-7 cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression level less than 60% of wild-type p53 in MCF-7 cells.
